title-group.article-title: Towards a European Social Safety Net?

p.mixed-citation: The scale is 1 for the first adult, 0.7 for additional persons aged 14 or over, and 0.5 for those aged under 14. The number aged 0-14 is used from Feinstein (1972, Table 56), and the number of household heads estimated using the proportion of 1/2.78 found in the 1937-38 budget survey.
